verses.name: Matthew 5:36
verses.text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head, because thou canst not make one hair white or black.

verses.name: Matthew 5:37
verses.text: But let your communication be, Yea, yea; Nay, nay: for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil.

verses.name: Matthew 5:38
verses.text: Ye have heard that it hath been said, An eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth:

verses.name: Matthew 5:39
verses.text: But I say unto you, That ye resist not evil: but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek, turn to him the other also.

verses.name: Matthew 5:40
verses.text: And if any man will sue thee at the law, and take away thy coat, let him have thy cloke also.
